title: Give me a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 on reviewing in NLP research

Here is a reading list of 20 articles up to 2020 on reviewing in NLP research. These articles cover various aspects of reviewing in NLP research, including the challenges, best practices, and applications
The Challenges of Evaluating NLP Systems

This article discusses the challenges of evaluating natural language processing (NLP) systems, including the need for standard evaluation metrics and the difficulty of comparing systems across different domains

A Survey of Evaluation Methods for NLP Systems" by Yoon Kim. This article provides a comprehensive survey of evaluation methods for NLP systems, including traditional evaluation metrics, active learning, and transfer learning

The Role of Evaluation in NLP Research" by Christopher Manning and Daniel Jurafsky. This article discusses the importance of evaluation in NLP research, including the need to compare systems across different domains and the challenges of evaluating systems in real-world settings
